articles.description: GB's Katie Boulter opens her US Open campaign before Andy Murray and Cameron Norrie are in action - follow live text and Radio 5 Sport Extra commentary.
articles.title: US Open: Boulter among six Britons in action - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Live commentary from 19 ties in round two of the EFL Cup.
articles.title: EFL Cup: Radio & text updates from 19 second-round ties

articles.description: The Spanish Football Federation is exploring its options over whether it can sack Women's World Cup-winning head coach Jorge Vilda.
articles.title: Spanish FA exploring options to sack Vilda

articles.description: Bobbi Gibb was denied by a letter and obscured by an image, but has beaten both to be recognised for what she is.
articles.title: 'Incapable' - the woman who raced a lie

articles.description: England's Ella Toone says Luis Rubiales ''should do the right thing'' and resign after he kissed Spanish player Jenni Hermoso on the lips after the World Cup final.
articles.title: Rubiales situation too far gone for apology - Toone

articles.description: Virgil van Dijk is charged by the Football Association for acting in an "improper manner" after being sent off in Liverpool's win over Newcastle.
articles.title: FA charges Van Dijk after Newcastle red card

articles.description: Live video and text coverage of the Irish Premiership match between Glentoran and Crusaders at The Oval, Belfast.
articles.title: Watch: Glentoran v Crusaders

articles.description: Third seed Daniil Medvedev needs just 74 minutes to cruise into the second round of the US Open with a win over Attila Balazs.
articles.title: Medvedev advances at US Open with 74-minute win

articles.description: Brighton sign Cameroon-born midfielder Carlos Baleba on a five-year deal for 27m euros (£23.2m) from French side Lille.
articles.title: Brighton sign midfielder Baleba from Lille

articles.description: Ons Jabeur overcomes breathing difficulties and her own "attitude" to beat Camila Osorio and reach the second round of the US Open.
articles.title: Jabeur overcomes medical concerns to beat Osorio
